Dalenda Abdou, aha egwu nke Khira Bent Abdelkader Gharbi (Arabic; 2 Nọvemba 1928 - 29 June 2021), bụ onye  mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri.
Abdou malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri n'afọ 1947 na ndị otu Al Ittihad Al Masrahi de Béchir Rahal

Ọ na-agbanwere n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ, dịka Troupe du théâtre populaire nke Abdelaziz El Aroui duziri. Ọ nakweere aha "Dalenda Abdou" mgbe nduzi sitere n'aka Béchir Rahal, onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ihe nkiri Tunisia na nna onye na-agụ egwu Oulaya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, dịka The Two Orphans
N'afọ 1951, Abdou mere nke mbụ ya na Redio Tunis, ebe ọ zutere onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Mongi Ben Yaïche
Ọ malitere ịpụta na ihe ngosi telivishọn, ọkachasị na-egwu Hnani na Mhal Chahed Ọ na-emekarị ka ndị agadi nwanyị na telivishọn, onye a na-ewere na ọ maara nke ọma.
N'abalị 29 ọnwa June afọ 2021, Dalenda Abdou nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha nke Tunis [fr] n'ihi COVID-19 mgbe ọ dị afọ 92.
